COMMENT_TX: Debut game for Chris Sabo
$Ken Dayley injured
Debut game for Scott Arnold
$Paul O'Neill tried to steal an occupied base
$fan interference
$Jose Uribe broke for 2B, throw by Frank Williams hit him and Robby Thompson scored

$Tim Teufel stepped out of the batter's box as Tom Browning started his windup; Browning stopped and HP umpire Gregg called the balk; Reds manager Pete Rose argued with Gregg and then went to the mound to talk with Browning

ej,browt001,P,grege901,Brawl after HBP ej,strad001,P,grege901,Brawl after HBP $Tom Browning was upset about the balk call; when he hit Tim Teufel, both benches cleared; Darryl Strawberry led the charge to the mound; Browning and Strawberry ejected by HP umpire Eric Gregg

ej,rosep001,M,palld901,Call at 1B (Shoved umpire) umpchange,9,ump1b,kiblj901 umpchange,9,ump2b,(None) $Barry Larkin's throw was wide of the base and Nick Esasky had to pull his foot off the bag to catch the ball; the ball beat Wilson to the base; 1B umpire Dave Pallone made a delayed call, waiting until Wilson crossed the bag; and Howard Johnson scored from 2B while Esasky argued the call; Reds manager Pete Rose ran out to argue; Rose put his finger in Pallone's face and Pallone reacted by doing the same to Rose, who pushed the umpire; Pallone ejected Rose and turned to walk away; Rose shoved Pallone from the back; the other umpires ran to help; fans threw trash on the field and the game was delayed 14 minutes; when Pallone went back to 1B, fans threw more items onto the field and John Franco refused to pitch; Pallone left the field and did not finish the game, with 2B umpire John Kibler moving to 1B; after the game, Rose had a small bruise on his left cheek and claimed that Pallone caused it by scraping his face during the argument; Rose was  suspended for 30 days and fined $10,000
$Pat Perry balked during the intentional walk by not coming to a stop in the set position
$Kal Daniels was hurt banging against the wall
$Kal Daniels charged mound after inside pitch and the benches cleared
$Ron Robinson had perfect game with two outs in ninth
ej,robir001,P,davig901,Call at HP Ron Robinson ejected by HP umpire Gerry Davis
$Dave Concepcion out on appeal for leaving 3B too soon
$Dave Collins took possible HR away from Alex Trevino
Drizzle starts; rain earlier
$Mike Scott slipped on mound, straining left hamstring
$Eric Davis left game due to HBP in first
$Nick Esasky made a bad return throw to the pitcher
$Chris Speier's relay to 3B hit runner
$Kal Daniels hurts neck and shoulder colliding with wall
ej,rosep001,M,westj901,Call at 1B $Reds manager Rose ejected by 1B umpire West for arguing O'Neill was safe at 1st
$Reds manager Pete Rose gave incorrect lineup card to HP umpire Gerry Davis; Collins now substitute
$Dave Collins batted out of turn
$Chris Sabo reached on error; Eric Davis was correct batter and called out on the batting out of turn

ej,rosep001,M,palld901,Call at 1B (Shoved umpire) umpchange,9,ump1b,kiblj901 umpchange,9,ump2b,(None) $Barry Larkin's throw was wide of the base and Nick Esasky had to pull his foot off the bag to catch the ball; the ball beat Wilson to the base; 1B umpire Dave Pallone made a delayed call, waiting until Wilson crossed the bag; and Howard Johnson scored from 2B while Esasky argued the call; Reds manager Pete Rose ran out to argue; Rose put his finger in Pallone's face and Pallone reacted by doing the same to Rose, who pushed the umpire; Pallone ejected Rose and turned to walk away; Rose shoved Pallone from the back; the other umpires ran to help; fans threw trash on the field and the game was delayed 14 minutes; when Pallone went back to 1B, fans threw more items onto the field and John Franco refused to pitch; Pallone left the field and did not finish the game, with 2B umpire John Kibler moving to 1B; after the game, Rose had a small bruise on his left cheek and claimed that Pallone caused it by scraping his face during the argument; Rose was  suspended for 30 days and fined $10,000
